Extend the capabilities of Sintelix

The Sintelix Extension is a Chrome extension that adds functionality to the built in Web Harvester and lets you download images of your Sintelix networks.

Enhanced for Sintelix 8. Sintelix version 7 or higher is required to use the Sintelix Extension.

Learn more at www.sintelix.com/harvest
